name: Sorting Hat VR
description:
Based on Harry Potter / Pottermore, the Sorting Hat Housing Assessment not only reflects diverse results based on complex set of action-based questions, but also brings to life the limitless possibilities of magic. Make potions, meet your favorite wizards, dress for a life of magic, or even fight trolls in this wacky journey to attaining your Harry Potter house placement! Play and then share your house results with friends!

To any at Warner Bros, Pottermore, Portkey Games:

This project has been built purely as a fan made adventure because the concept had not yet been made for VR yet. Sorting Hat VR is a free experience that will not be incorporating ads or any such revenue generation methods.
